content:
May I ask what problem may cause the message not to be sent out.
My server login works fine. And check (all running), restart all services (zulip rabbitmq-server ngnix, restart without error message.
圖片.png
This topic was moved here from #issues > Messages are not sent. by Neil Pilgrim (neiljp).

@洪ALAN: Can you check the developer tools network tab? If you're using Chrome, here's how to do that.

I'd expect hat you'll see some sort of network failure talking to the server.

You should also check /var/log/zulip/errors.log.
